com.soa.console.policy.renderer

Interface PolicyRenderer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CompliancePolicyRenderer, OperationalPolicyRenderer, QoSPolicyRenderer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractOperationalPolicyRenderer, CompliancePolicyRendererBase, QoSPolicyRendererBase

    public interface PolicyRenderer
    The PolicyRenderer is a template interface for displaying policy specific content in a portlet that is used by the Governance Console.
    Since:
    6.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getContentLocation(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Render policy content given policy key and return a location where this content can be found.
      java.lang.String getId()
      Returns an String identifier for the type of policy.

    • Method Detail

      • getContentLocation

        java.lang.String getContentLocation(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                             throws com.digev.fw.exception.GException
        Render policy content given policy key and return a location where this content can be found.
        Parameters:
        policyKey - policy key of the policy to render
        Returns:
        Throws:
        com.digev.fw.exception.GException

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Returns an String identifier for the type of policy. The identifier is used to identify policies of this type in the system. It is also used as a key for looking up policy specific labels and messages in the system's resource bundle.
        Returns:
        String identifier for the type of policy, i.e., "policy.mytype".
